document_data.mainbody: '''Lilit Pass''' was the name of a narrow chasm in the [[Aphrunn Mountains]]. It led from the [[Halondar]] to [[Daroush]].
document_data.History: In [[145 DR]], a small segment of the army of [[Dempster Turmish]] accidentally took Lilit Pass and ended up in Daroush. The confused troops captured the village with ease.
